model.name: TTS ACE-Step v1.5 Turbo LM_0.6B 2B
model.description: ACE-Step 1.5 Turbo (8 steps) with 0.6B LM, a diffusion-based music generation model with improved conditioning and timbre control. The LM 0.6B will increase the audio output quality thanks to Medium/Weak Audio Understanding & Composition Capability.

prompt:
[Verse]
Neon rain on the city line
You hum the tune and I fall in time
[Chorus]
Hold me close and keep the time
alt_prompt: Dreamy synth-pop with shimmering pads, soft vocals, and a slow dance groove.
